div.p: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups

description.value: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

definition.value: A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

short.value: Elements that belong to all information items.

definition.value: Elements that belong to all information items.

short.value: A human language, spoken or written.

definition.value: A human language, spoken or written.

short.value: A set of rules under which this content was created

definition.value: A set of rules under which this content was created

short.value: A human-readable narrative, potentially including images, that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human.

definition.value: A human-readable narrative, potentially including images, that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human.

short.value: List of past encounter statuses

definition.value: List of past encounter statuses

short.value: A state that relates to the workflow or interpretation of this resource. Certain status values can modify the meaning of the resource, for example, entered-in-error. When a boolean value is used, Status of true indicates the record is active, false means inactive.

definition.value: A state that relates to the workflow or interpretation of this resource. Certain status values can modify the meaning of the resource, for example, entered-in-error. When a boolean value is used, Status of true indicates the record is active, false means inactive.

short.value: Business identifier or external id for this resource.

definition.value: Business identifier or external id for this resource.

short.value: A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year.

definition.value: A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year. If the start element is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end element is missing, it means that the period is ongoing, or the start may be in the past, and the end date in the future, which means that period is expected/planned to end at the specified time. The end value includes any matching date/time. For example, the period 2011-05-23 to 2011-05-27 includes all the times from the start of the 23rd May through to the end of the 27th of May.

short.value: A diagnosis, which is a disease or injury determined to be present through evaluation of patient history, examination, and/or review of laboratory data. This element is not a stand-alone representation of the condition that was diagnosed, but is meant to be used as an sub-structure in a resource, such as Encounter.

definition.value: A diagnosis, which is a disease or injury determined to be present through evaluation of patient history, examination, and/or review of laboratory data. This element is not a stand-alone representation of the condition that was diagnosed, but is meant to be used as an sub-structure in a resource, such as Encounter.

short.value: The SubjectOfRecord when restricted to being a Patient resource.

definition.value: The SubjectOfRecord when restricted to being a Patient resource.

short.value: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

definition.value: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

short.value: A social or legal structure formed by human beings.

definition.value:
A social or legal structure formed by human beings.
Organization type is restricted to 0..1 in FHIR DSTU2, similarly restricted here.

short.value: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.

definition.value: Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.

short.value: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

definition.value: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

short.value: List of past encounter statuses

definition.value: List of past encounter statuses

short.value: An indication of the importance of an action relative to other actions.

definition.value: An indication of the importance of an action relative to other actions.

short.value: PositiveInt or code representing an indication of the importance of an action relative to other actions.

definition.value: PositiveInt or code representing an indication of the importance of an action relative to other actions.

short.value: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur. The managing organization assumes a level of responsibility for the patient during this time.

definition.value: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur. The managing organization assumes a level of responsibility for the patient during this time.

short.value: Record of someone or something involvement in an activity or event.

definition.value: Record of someone or something involvement in an activity or event.

short.value: A choice of Practitioner and RelatedPerson as participant

definition.value: A choice of Practitioner and RelatedPerson as participant

short.value: The role played by the participant engaged in the action, for example, as the attending physician, surgical assistant, etc.

definition.value: The role played by the participant engaged in the action, for example, as the attending physician, surgical assistant, etc.

short.value: The point in time or span of time the participant is involved.

definition.value: The point in time or span of time the participant is involved.

short.value: The party represented by the actual participant.

definition.value: The party represented by the actual participant.

short.value: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time.

definition.value: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time.

short.value: The length of time that something continues.

definition.value: The length of time that something continues.

short.value: The justification, as a code.

definition.value: The justification, as a code. Reason is a string or CodeableConcept in DSTU2 but in later versions only a CodeableConcept, so we are not going to support a string.

short.value: Locations where the patient has been.

definition.value: Locations where the patient has been.

short.value: The larger entity that the asserted item is a portion of. For example, an organization part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.

definition.value: The larger entity that the asserted item is a portion of. For example, an organization part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.
A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.
